title: Realtime Chat
summary: WebSocket chat with typing indicators, persistence, and moderation tools.
description: A production‑grade chat built with Node.js, Redis pub/sub, JWT auth, and a modular frontend. Includes rate limiting, message editing, and emoji reactions.

title: Image Classifier
summary: CNN trained on small dataset; exported to run in‑browser via WebGPU.
description: Built data pipeline in Python, trained with PyTorch, exported to ONNX, and ran in WebGPU with a lightweight inference wrapper.

title: Trello Clone
summary: Kanban with drag‑and‑drop, offline cache, optimistic updates.
description: React/TS app using IndexedDB for offline, react-beautiful-dnd for drag, and a tiny server for sync. Comprehensive test suite.
